mapper.insert: insert into com_board ( bbs_no, bbs_title, bbs_content, bbs_file ) values (#{bbs_no},#{bbs_title},#{bbs_content},#{bbs_file})
mapper.update: update com_board set bbs_no = #{bbs_no}, bbs_title = #{bbs_title}, bbs_content = #{bbs_content}, bbs_file = #{bbs_file} where bbs_no = #{bbs_no}
